message.content:
Create a new Next.js 14 project using TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and the App Router. Install framer-motion for animations, lucide-react for icons, and clsx for class management.

Design System Requirements:

Background: Deep Black (#000000 or very dark grey like #0a0a0a).

Accents: Neon Blue (e.g., #00f3ff or Tailwind cyan-400/blue-500).

Text: Pure White (#ffffff) for headings, off-white (#e5e5e5) for body text.

Please set up the globals.css and tailwind.config.ts to enforce this theme globally. Also, note that I have a HAR file located at projects/beta.faceiqlabs.com.har which contains the original assets and styles we will be referencing.

            content_type = header['value']

"

import json

# Find HTML responses and get the body content
for entry in har['log']['entries']:
    url = entry['request']['url']
    if 'faceiqlabs.com' in url and url.endswith('/') or 'faceiqlabs.com' == url.split('/')[-1]:
        content_type = ''
        for header in entry['response']['headers']:
            if header['name'].lower() == 'content-type':
                content_type = header['value']
                break
        if 'html' in content_type.lower():
            text = entry['response']['content'].get('text', '')
            # Find body content
            if '<body' in text:
                body_start = text.find('<body')
                print(f'URL: {url}')
                print(text[body_start:body_start+5000])
                print('---')
                break
"
